23/03/2022, 10:44 am - Fatima Sis BDS: غلامی میں نہ کام آتی ہیں شمشیریں نہ تدبیریں
جو ہو ذوق یقیں پیدا تو کٹ جاتی ہیں زنجیریں

Resolution Day: 70 years of 23rd March, thousands of Muslims from all over the sub-continent gathered in Lahore at Minaar-e-Pakistan. They had one dream, one vision,  and one mission. And on that one day, under the leadership of Jinnah and others, the struggle for Pakistan started with full force and it ended with the creation of Pakistan. 

On Pakistan Day, may Allah bless us with integrity to be proud of our country and may we understand the true meaning of resolution and steadfastness this day.

Graphics by: Syed Shahmeer Hussain

23/03/2022, 8:29 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: *BLOOD DONATION CAMP - UET NEW CAMPUS*
"A donation of blood means a few minutes to you, but a lifetime for somebody else."

Voluntary and unpaid regular blood donation is an act of solidarity and is required all over the world.According to WHO, many developing countries face severe shortage of blood. "The need for blood is universal, but access to blood for all those who need it is not,"

In order to raise awareness and to meet the needs of blood donations, BDS and it's team is arranging BLOOD CAMP at Health Clinic UET New Campus soon. It's the first time that a Blood Donation Camp is being arranged in our university, so each one of you is encouraged and invited to contribute, donate and volunteer in this camp. It's a deed that serves both the donor and recipient!

Graphics by: Adil Khan
23/03/2022, 8:29 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: https://www.instagram.com/p/Cbc1uoCol6U/?utm_medium=copy_link

https://www.facebook.com/380318832401905/posts/1374211993012579/

*DONATION CAMP IN UET NEW CAMPUS SOON. INSHALLAH.*

25/03/2022, 3:20 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: "The blood you donate is not just a fluid but a hope for life."

Blood donation is going to cost you nothing as your body generates new cells every 120 days but it can bless someone with a new life.
To raise awareness about the health related benefits of blood donation and also the compassion to serve humanity Team BDS UET New Campus is soon going to arrange a "Blood Donation Camp",

 Location: HEALTH CLINIC CENTER, UET NEW CAMPUS..


Stay tuned and be ready to become a donor and save lives.

*BLOOD DONATION CAMP*
*31st MARCH, THURSDAY*

Like, share and comment.
28/03/2022, 8:15 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: Blood Donation Camp - UET New Campus
A drop for you is an ocean for someone else!
The need for blood is increasing throughout the world as someone needs blood every two seconds and we need to motivate people to donate blood at least once in life to save the lives of people in need. 

BDS is arranging donation camp in Health Clinic on Thursday, 31st of March in collaboration with Umm E Nusrat Foundation for the cause of raising awareness and helping patients in need. 

Donating blood is a divine experience, try it at least once in your lifetime!
28/03/2022, 8:15 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
28/03/2022, 8:15 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: SHARE THIS ON YOUR STORIES EVERYONE!!

28/03/2022, 8:31 pm - Anns Khokhar👤 CS 19: Done
28/03/2022, 8:46 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: "Donate Blood, So that Other People Are Also Encouraged To Do So. ” 
   
Life is precious and valuable to everyone. If you want to work smarter rather than harder and doing efforts,  constantly improving your skills in every matter of life. As we know that every blood donor is a life saviour. Developing these skills and then struggle and make efforts for donating Blood will allow you to feel more confident in using emerging technology and you will become faster to save lives by Grace of Allah Almighty. An active society that effectively represents its department and field, BDS has been active in bringing tech related opportunities for the needy people, who needs the blood.Such opportunities widen the horizon of thinking of students and enable them to progress scientifically of donating Blood and save lives. UMS proudly announces its collaboration with BDS to take forward this great cause.

07/04/2022, 8:12 am - Baghla 2: "He who has health has hope; and he who has hope has everything",Thomas Carlyle

Health is a gift which money cannot buy. It's your *McGuffin* . Your life depends on it. We are living in a very fast age of internet and cyberspace, in which all of our tasks could be performed within a click but health comes on the contrary. It requires your time and dedication.
In recent years, the average life expectancy in Pakistan is decreasing gradually. Heart diseases and Obesity is spreading like fire among young people.

A life without health is like a river without running water. Make yourself consistent. Have some exercise and meditate, let your body and mind heal. Have a good laugh and long sleep. Do things that your future self will thank you for.

A fit and healthy body is the best fashion statement.

“What drains your spirit, drains your body. What fuels your spirit, fuels your body.” – Carolyn Myss .

10/04/2022, 8:53 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
10/04/2022, 8:55 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: Ramadan is a month that symbolises sacrifice, giving for the needs of people around us.

In this Holy Month when the reward for every good deed is tenfold your single blood donation can save up to three lives. There is a misconception being built in our society that one can not donate blood during Ramadan when in reality it is medically proven that blood can be donated after the fasting hours and it means no harm to the health of the donor but adds to his rewards that are eventually going to benefit him in the world hereafter. 

------------------------------------------------
BDS UET New Campus

Bushra Nasir

Usman Akram

16/04/2022, 1:30 am - Baghla 2: https://www.facebook.com/380318832401905/posts/1389522488148196/

https://www.instagram.com/p/CcYnUSBI9It/?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=
16/04/2022, 1:30 am - Baghla 2: درد دل کے واسطے پیدا کیا انسان کو
ورنہ طاعت کے لیے کچھ کم نہ تھے کر و بیاں
She was named “The Mother of Pakistan”, by which she acted accordingly with all her soul. Alongside her husband, Builquis Bano Edhi served humanity without any discrimination of race or religion. She was the Co- chairman of Edhi foundation and an active patron of society.
Despite her husband; Andul Sattar Edhi being received by Presidents and her own appearance on Pakistani television the couple lived modestly in a two-room apartment which is part of one of their orphanages.
She received many international and national awards due to her definite and firm character and her enthusiasm to help humanity. Builquis Bano holds the honour to receive the prestigious  Hilal-i-Imtiaz, which is the highest degree award of service to the state.In 2015, she received the Mother Teresa Memorial International Award for Social Justice.
Indeed her departure had left a void space in Pakistan philanthropist society and her character would always be remembered in the history of Pakistan.It is true, as the saying goes: “There is a woman behind every man”. Bilquis Bano proved it right with all her might. 

Caption credits: 
Muzammil Khan 

Graphic credits:
Abdullah Afzal

18/04/2022, 9:00 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: ~MONTHLY REPORT MARCH'22
"Every blood donor is a life saver"
Streak of saving lives = donating blood♥️
Blood is the most precious thing one can give to another person; the gift of life. 
We appreciate the donation of every donor who become a hope of someone's life and we appreciate the effort of every member of BDS who makes it possible to connect the donors and the needy.
All this we achieved in the month of March was possible due to the continuous efforts and devotion of our team as we know alone one can do a little, together we can do so much.
Hoping to see the team BDS New Campus more powerful and united.

Usman Akram 

🩸Caption credits:
Maryam Rafique

Allama Iqbal was not just a poet of the East. He is literally the Spiritual Father Of Pakistan and his work has transcended borders, languages and time. His vision for our homeland has been regurgitated countless times in textbooks, but rarely can you find someone who understands his words. On the death anniversary of of this pillar of strength, we remember this wonderful man through the words he penned down so beautifully.
BDS urges the nation to take active part in changing the future of Pakistan.

22/04/2022, 8:32 am - Baghla 2: The first Earth Day was proclaimed in 1970 to educate people on responsible environmental stewardship, protect the environment, and conserve resources. Earth Day is now widely recognized as the largest secular observance in the world, marked by more than a billion people every year as a day of action. 

Earth is the only planet we have to live on. But the Earth was never ours. We have not inherited the Earth from our ancestors, we've borrowed it from our future generations. For the past 200 years human have been conquering the planet and now are beating it to death. 
Only when the last tree has died and the last river has poisoned and the last fish been caught will we realize we cannot eat money. Let's promise ourselves this Earth day, to not blow it and protect every inch of it. For good planet are hard to find.

23/04/2022, 1:58 pm - Baghla 2: "حق ہے علی کے ساتھ ، علی حق کے ساتھ ہے
یہ بات تو رسول ﷺ نے سب کو بتائی ہے
شیر خدا نے سجدے میں تلوار کھائی ہے" 

He was born in Kaaba, Makkah. He was his cousin, son-in-law, companion and raised by Prophet Muhammad ﷺ himself. He was one of the first believers of Islam. He helped Muhammadﷺ emigrate on the night of Laylat al-Mabit, by sleeping in his place. He was Murtaza (the chosen one), Asadullah( lion of Allah), Amir al-Mu'minin (prince of the faithful) and Mawla al-Mottaqin (master of the God-fearing) 

He is Ali ibn Ali Talib R.A, the Fourth Caliph of Islam. He was the last ruler amongst the Khulafa-e-Rashideen. Today marks the martyrdom of Mola Ali Sher-e-Khuda in the city of Kufa (present day Iraq).
Prophet Muhammad ﷺ  bestowed him upon the title "Path to knowledge".
The path of his character and traits is the Holy grail for Muslims all across the world. 

There was a prophecy of Hazrat Muhammad  ﷺ about Maula Ali that stated: 

"پچھلی امتوں کا سب سےبڑا بد بخت انسان وہ تھا جس نے حضرت صالح علیہ السلام کی اونٹنی کو قتل کیا۔ میری امت کا بد ترین شخص وہ ہوگا جو تیرے سر کے خون سے تیری داڑھی کو تر کر دے گا۔"

🩸Caption credits:
Muzzamil Khan / @_.muzzamil._.khan._

He helped Muhammadﷺ emigrate on the night of Laylat al-Mabit, by sleeping in his place. He was Murtaza (the chosen one), Asadullah( lion of Allah), Amir al-Mu'minin (prince of the faithful) and Mawla al-Mottaqin (master of the God-fearing)

He is Ali ibn Ali Talib R.A, the Fourth Caliph of Islam. He was the last ruler amongst the Khulafa-e-Rashideen. Today marks the martyrdom of Mola Ali Sher-e-Khuda in the city of Kufa (present day Iraq).
Prophet Muhammad ﷺ  bestowed him upon the title  "Path to knowledge".
The path of his character and traits is the Holy grail for Muslims all across the world.

"پچھلی امتوں کا سب سےبڑا بد بخت انسان وہ تھا جس نے حضرت صالح علیہ السلام کی اونٹنی کو قتل کیا۔ میری امت کا بد ترین شخص وہ ہوگا جو تیرے سر کے خون سے تیری داڑھی کو تر کر دے گا۔"

*LAYLAT AL QADAR*
28/04/2022, 8:28 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
28/04/2022, 8:28 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: اکثر شام کو آتی ہے فلک سے آواز
سجدہ کرتی ہے جس کو سحر وہ ہے آج کی رات 

Shab-e- Qadr, also known as Laylat al-Qadr, commemorates the day that the verses of the Quran were first revealed to Prophet Muhammad (PBUH). It is considered to be one of the holiest nights of the Islamic faith. To commemorate the day, Muslims recite the verses from the Quran the entire night. 

BDS and its team urge you all to pray for the betterment of the Muslims all over the world as this night is better than 1000 months.

🩸Caption credits:
Naeem Abbas

01/05/2022, 4:01 pm - Syed Ghani: Labour Day is a day we dedicate to our constant go-getters and valuable hard workers.We reflect on our journey and celebrate the contributions of our working nation.This day  shows the labour union achievement and also a holiday each year the workers acheive and Advocate the goal of eight hour work, eight hour for recreation and eight hour for totally rest.
BDS and it's team urges you to honour and respect our labours because they're the important part of our society and without them we can't even grow properly.

03/05/2022, 5:55 pm - Baghla 2: ~3rd May 2022
World ASTHMA DAY
World asthma day is organised by Global Initiative for Asthma of WHO collaborative organisation founded in 1993 .
The day was created to promote awareness of asthma as a condition that increasing. Infact it affects at least 14% of children worldwide and seems to be growing prevalence .By 2016, the World Health Organisation recognise asthma as a major public health importance.
Let us promise ourselves to take more precautions from asthma and to have surroundings that are clear and free from toxins.

18/05/2022, 1:39 am - Abdullah Bhai BDS: Assalam u Alaikum! 
Today i gonna share little thoughts about BDS. BDS is a society where i have learned the real purpose of my life. i still remember the day when i and @923451406343 were at hostel and he insisted to me to join BDS, I was little confused but things started to change when i arranged first donor for Blood Donation. Duas and pleasure i recieved from them brought a huge impact on my life. Boom!  from the very next day i realized the thing what i really want to do, and Alhumdulillah! Now i'm an active social worker. I love to help the people in need, cos it gives me immense pleasure. BDS will remain always closest to my heart. We as a team worked harder to Uplifting BDS in campus. I specially want to mention *Usman* and @923451406343 here because at start we were just 3. We worked when there were few members, and the existing members did nothing 🙂. Alhumdulillah After 1 year it is best society of campus. Because we do much much more than other societies in the whole year. Now we are well established. Im gonna sign off from my position with heavy heart. its an emotional moment for me to leave BDS. I hope you guys will work as a team and continue the legacy of BDS. Finger crossed, Hoping for the Best!
*Abdullah Khan*
Blood Manager BDS UET New Campus 2020-2021
Allah Hafiz!

18/05/2022, 5:19 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: World AIDS Vaccine Day

On the occasion of World AIDS Vaccine Day, we must all come together and offer our emotional and moral support to those who are fighting the battle against AIDS.

We all need to have a liberal mindset and open arms towards those who are suffering from AIDS to make this journey easier.

31/05/2022, 1:23 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: <Media omitted>
31/05/2022, 1:23 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: Every year, on 31 May, the World Health Organization (WHO) and global partners celebrate World No Tobacco Day (WNTD). The annual campaign is an opportunity to raise awareness on the harmful and deadly effects of tobacco use and second-hand smoke exposure, and to discourage the use of tobacco in any form.
The focus of World No Tobacco Day 2019 is on "tobacco and lung health." The campaign will increase awareness on:
the negative impact that tobacco has on people’s lung health, from cancer to chronic respiratory disease,
the fundamental role lungs play for the health and well-being of all people.
BDS and it's team urges you to quit smoking in order to live a long and healthy life.

02/06/2022, 11:11 pm - Syed Hamza Uet Ksk: خون عطیہ کرنے کے  فوائد
ریسرچ کے مطابق: 

*1. خون عطیہ کرنے سے انسانی صحت اور بہتر ہونے لگتی ہے*

*2. جسم میں آئرن کی مقدار خون عطیہ کرنے سے متوازن رہتی ہے۔*

*3. خون عطیہ کرنے سے امراض قلب اور دل کا دورہ پڑنے کے امکانات کم ہوجاتے ہیں۔*
02/06/2022, 11:11 pm - Syed Hamza Uet Ksk: *4. خون عطیہ کرنے سے جسم اسمارٹ اور توانا رہتا ہے ۔*

*5. اکثر دیکھا گیا ہے کہ ایسے افراد جو باقاعدگی سے خون دیتے ہیں وہ کینسر جیسے خطرناک مرض سے بہت حد تک محفوظ رہتے ہیں۔*

*6. خون عطیہ کرنے سے جسم میں خون کے جمنے کا عمل رک جاتا ہے اور خون کی گردش متوازن رہتی ہے۔*
02/06/2022, 11:11 pm - Syed Hamza Uet Ksk: *7.خون دینے سے جلد میں تنائو پیدا ہوتا ہے اور وقت سے پہلے پڑنے والی جھریوں سے نجات حاصل ہوجاتی ہے*

05/06/2022, 8:51 pm - Nauman Bhai BDS: Assalam u Alaikum!
kal mera BDS group mei akhri din hoga, InshaAllah ! BDS k sath ye saalon ka safar meri zindagi ka wo haseen hissa ha jisko mei chah kr b ni bhula skta, is society mei member bn kr add hoa, phr mei 2019 mei BDS ka President bna ,wese to mere amal kuch achay ni thy lkn shayd Allah ko yehi manzoor tha k mei is naik kaam ko aggay le kr chalo , Alhumdulillah! or jb president bna society mei srf 3 se 4 log thy 🙂, Koi BDS ko join ni krna chahta tha, even ksi ko pta b ni tha k BDS jesi society exist b krti ha campus mei, phr hum chalte gaye or karwaan bnta gya , or jb hum ne BDS mei phla blood arrange kiya, it was one of the best feeling i have ever had, phr society jis mei kbhi saalon mei 1 2 cases close hote thy, wo society 25 -30 case close krne lg gyi, specially Abdullah, Usman , Moiz ye banday hamesha mere sth rhy, phr os k bd aye kuch  juniors Gems jinho ne society ko ksi or hi level pr phncha diya jin mei Adnan, Ibrar, Abrar, Nouman Ranjha,Hafiz Waseem, Subhan, Ammar, Ans, Hassan, Nabeel, Waleed, Fatima, Sajida, Ghulam, Hafiz Hamza,  Hamza shah, Talha , Anas, Eman, Zirwa, Mehak, Aman, Saman thy, (agr ksi ka naam reh gya ho to mazrat) . In sab ki mehnat or Allah ki madad ki waja se BDS Charity , Warm Drive, Ramadan drive, Oldage n orphanage visits, on campus event, 300+ cases closed etc. sab 1 hi saal mei possible hoa, or os saal mei BDS almost sab se zyada popular society bn gyi campus ki 🙂 is society ko chorne ka dukh to ha , lkn khushi b ha os umeed ki k ab ap sab mil kr BDS ko or b zyada top pr phnchayein gy InshaAllah! 
Bs end pr itna kehna chaho ga k BDS ap sab ki society ha jitni is mei President/ VP / GS ki worth ha otni hi general member ki b worth ha, is lyye kbhi dil chota ni krna , Umeed ha ap sab is naik kaam ko mil kr krein gy, na srf campus mei balke passout hone k bd b Khidmate Khalq jari rkhein gy InshaAllah ! Allah apka hami o nasir ho , 
 ستاروں سے آگے جہاں اور بھی ہیں 
ابھی عشق کے امتحان اور بھی ہیں
Allah Hafiz ☺️

12/06/2022, 1:17 pm - +92 301 2999008: The World Day Against Child Labour, which is held every year on June 12, is intended to foster the worldwide movement against child labour.The World Day Against Child Labour is an International Labour Organization (ILO)-sanctioned holidayfirst launched in 2002 to raise awareness and activism to prevent child labour. It was spurred by ratifications of ILO Convention No. 138 on the minimum age for employment and ILO Convention No. 182 on the worst forms of child labour.
Significance of World Against Child Labor Day is that, it  day mainly focuses on the development of children and it protects the right to education and dignified life for the children. 
BDS want people to raise awareness about child labor beacuse It is a serious problem in pakistan. Many  children in pakistan are deprive  of education and blessed childhood so we are aiming to help such children.
🩸Caption Credit:
    Aneeza Naz
🩸 Graphics Credit:
    Hamza Hamid

*FATHER'S DAY POST.* LIKE, SHARE AND COMMENT.
19/06/2022, 12:11 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
19/06/2022, 12:11 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: Our dads will always be our heroes. Convey that to him with one of these caring and inspirational Father’s Day greetings to make him feel like the best Dad ever. Fathers somehow have this magical ability to make you feel better about anything. When mom says no, you can somehow always convince dad to try to get her to change her mind — and no matter how much he rolls his eyes, he’s usually always ready to give you those few extra bucks you need. So it’s only right you shower him with lots of love on Father’s Day 2022, which falls on Sunday, June 19 this year.
BDS and it's team urges you to love, respect and take care of your father.

🩸Caption credits:
Bushra Nasir

🩸Graphic credits: Syed Shahmeer Hussain

 *World sickle cell day post* . LIKE, SHARE AND COMMENT as much as you can do✨
19/06/2022, 5:21 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: Every year, on June 19, countries all over the world celebrate world sickle cell day, which was initially presented as a resolution by the United Nations in 2008. 

Sickle cell disease is an inherited blood disorder that causes "sickle" shaped blood cells that can stick together, blocking blood flow and oxygen from reaching all parts of the body.
The goal of this day is to recognize sickle cell anemia is a public health problem and promote education about the genetic condition.
Let us all educate ourselves and others about the disease as the 19th of June comes closer.

🩸Caption credits: 
Maryam Rafique 

🩸Graphic credits:
Muhammad Samiullah

“Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.” — Bob Riley

Though Team BDS is sad as the time to say goodbye to its passing out hierarchy has arrived, but, at the same time, we are extremely grateful and thankful for the work they have done for humanity. They have done extreme justice to the famous saying 
“Apne liye to Sab hi Jeete hain Is Jehan mai 
Hai Zindagi ka Maqsad Auron ke Kaam Ana”
They have proved that heroes are not born with a silver spoon, they are from us who endows their whole life for humanity. 

Team BDS UET New Campus wishes them best of luck for their future endeavours and send them off with a bouquet of prayers and wishes and also promise to continue their legacy in serving the humanity.

01/07/2022, 2:19 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: "When there are tears, you are a Shoulder. When there is pain, you are a Medicine. When there is a tragedy, you are a Hope."
Happy Doctor's Day; 
Celebrating our heroes on July 1st, a day dedicated to doctors who stake their own lives to save others. Doctors are always important people in everyone's lives. When we need help with our health, we go to the doctor, and since the Coronavirus, doctors have become heroes and superheroes. The world has recently learned how doctors contribute to society. While we were isolated, doctors were constantly fighting for the lives of infected people. Doctors are doing everything they can to deal with the pandemic and help patients recover. They are, without a doubt, the greatest hero of all time.
BDS appreciates your commitment to providing excellence!
Wishing each one of you a happy & healthy Doctors’ Day!

. . . . . . . . . . . . .BDS UET NEW CAMPUS. . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

02/07/2022, 7:50 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: //Monthly Report May-June '22//

"Donating blood is an act of solidarity." 
Giving blood saves lives. The blood you give is a lifeline in an emergency and for people who need long-term treatments. 

We highly appreciate  all the donors for their kindness and for taking the time to make a blood donation. We, Red army, thank you from the bottom of our beating hearts for your selfless gift. It will go a long way as you have given someone a lifeline, just at the right time.
We appreciate dedications and  tremendous efforts of every BDS member who played their role in making this achievement in the past two months.

🩸Caption Credit :
      Bushra Eman

13/07/2022, 10:57 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: *ANNOUNCEMENT*
Assalam Alaikum Everyone,

Hope this message find you all in good health. This message concerns everyone in the society. This group consists more than 100 members but only a bunch of us are actively working for the cause. Our management team has decided to change that. 

In order to make every single one of you take part in arranging blood, the blood management team has set up a task for you. Each of you will have to *register at least 3 donors in BDS records* ( it can be a friend outside of university, a relative or a person you know who's willing to donate or has donated in past). Everyone will receive a format from our team members that you'll have to fill. 

At the end of the day, the purpose of every member in this society is to help arrange blood for patients in need. 

This is just one way to know that you are trying and showing efforts, *in case if any of you do not even respond to the message/task given by our management members we'll assume you do not want to be a part of this society and will be terminated.* We hope you guys will do your best and cooperate with our team!

Regards, 
Fatima Faheem
President BDS UET New Campus

Everyone in BDS Team must take part in awareness and collection. Every single BDS member convincing their friends and family members to donate atleast 100Rs, can lead up to a collection that can feed three families per month. Convince people around you to donate through social media too. 
Donate as much as you can because every penny counts!

30/07/2022, 8:37 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: وابستہ ذات ہے جو شہہِ مشرقین سے
آغازِ سال کرتا ہوں نامِ حسین (رض) سے ۔
Muslims across the world are going to celebrate the Hijri new Islamic Year.
The customs of Awal Muharram vary from country to country, though they generally involve attending various religious activities, spiritual singing and religious meetings. The traditions and customs for Muharram also vary between Shia and Sunni Muslims.

For both, the marking of the beginning of the new year is usually quiet, unlike New Year's celebrations associated with other calendars. It is a time for Muslims to reflect on the passing of time and their own mortality.
BDS and it's team urge you to change yourself, and let's plug today to donate maximum blood donations for Humanities.

🩸Caption by: Naeem Abbas

09/08/2022, 1:55 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: Everyone share it on your statuses and admire the great sacrifice in the course of Islamic history of our beloved Hazrat Imam Hussain Shaheed (R.A) 
"Death with dignity is better than a life of humiliation",  Imam Hussain (R.A).
09/08/2022, 1:58 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: “Qatl-e-Hussain (A.S) asal mein marg-e-yazeed hai
Islam zinda hota hai har karbala ke baad”——Maulana Mohammad Ali Jauhar

Literally meaning ‘the tenth’, Youm-e-Ashura marks the 10th day of the month of Muharram.
The Martyrdom of Imam Hussain(A.S), the grandson of the Prophet of Islam, occurred on the 10th of Muharram, the first month of the Islamic calendar (Aug 9th, 2022). Muslims worldwide commemorate that tragic event on this day on 680 AD. It was a battle between good and evil. Imam Hussain, the beloved grandson of Prophet Muhammed (peace be upon him), stood up against Yazid, who was made caliph (Khalifah) by his father, Amir Muawiyya. Yazid was an impious person who did not show Islamic character or behavior to be a Khalifah. Imam Hussain refused to recognize or endorse his leadership over the rapidly growing Muslim Ummah and Muslim state. If there’s one sacrifice that is lamented world across and rightfully so, it is that of Hussain (RA) and his family that stood up against the tyrannical rule of Yazid. Commemorated worldwide as The Great Sacrifice, Ashura brings with it a reminder of Hussain’s life and principles that he fought for.

Truth is for living and falsehood is for perishing. Team BDS UET(New Campus) pays tribute to the martyrs of Islam who stood firm and steadfast against the falsehood and evil and fought bravely till their last breaths.

Caption credits: Hammad Israr
Graphic credits: Muhammad Sami

26/08/2022, 1:42 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: //Women's Equality Day//

“When girls are educated, their countries become stronger and more prosperous.” 
- Michelle Obama
Women's Equality Day  is celebrated on August 26 and marks a turning point in the history of the struggle for equal treatment of women and women's rights.
Women's Equality Day is so significant because it promotes a sense of solidarity that makes the women's movement all the more powerful. When women work together to recognize and uplift each other in a way that emphasizes intersectionality and the freedoms that women in every walk of life deserve, change happens. 
A woman can be anything she wants as long as she decides to never fear anyone. Women are the world's greatest inspiration.  

This Women's Equality Day, BDS thank all those faceless, loud voices  who are fighting for the women's rights and work besides men for prosperity of the country.

Caption credits:
Bushra Eman 

Graphic credits:
Syed Shahmeer Hussain

28/08/2022, 1:37 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: ~Giving thanks for abundance is sweeter than the abundance itself~ RUMI

People of Pakistan have always stood up in the hour of need. Generosity among our people is overwhelming and over the clock. 
In this drastic times of floods all over the country, BDS made an attempt to push and help those who are affected and suffered by this catastrophe. We are very humbled towards all our donors, which are mostly university students, who made us capable for turning wheels towards a better place.

Our donations are still OPEN. The damage is huge. We still need your support and donations for the assistance of the flood victims. These are some of the images that we are sharing of the recent live scenes of the donation drive campaign of BDS in several flood affected areas.


Even a penny from you can help the needy and we ensure that even your single penny will reach the deserving people.
 
Note: Please send us a screenshot of your payment for verification.

15/09/2022, 11:21 pm - Rana Ammar: Assalam o Alaikum 
Hope you all Doing well 😇♥️
Peechly kuch days sy Kaafi issues arahy hain. 
FIRSTLY, Issue to yeh hai Tmam Members sahi sy Co operate ni kr rahy aur Activity ni show kr rahy. BESHAK yeh Kaam Allah ki Raza k liye hai. Lakin ap sb jo Is wqt blkl bhi kaam ni kr rahy wo Kindly thori sy Activity show krein. Hmary Blood Arrangement boht slow ho gai hai, Cases solving Donor Providing boht kam ho gai is ki wajah srf ek hai k sb apni effort ni show kr rhy Ap sb khud ko Un Patients ya un Attendents ki Jagah rakh kr dekhein aur Phr Sochein k agr aisa Wqt ap pr agya kabhi Allah na kary. Lakin agr agya aur apko aisa Response mily jaisa ap abhi kr rhy to ap ko kaisa Feel ho ga.
SECONDLY, Ek aur Issue jo ajkl kaafi ho raha ho raha hai wo yeh hai k members ek dosry sy Badtameezi ki baatein samny a  rahi. Yr Dekhein simple hai Give Respect to Take Respect. Yr agr koi senior ya Junior kisi member ko apas mai koi baat smjhaye to us ka bura na manaya krein. Apko agr wo baat theek ni lgi to ap Mujhy bta skty hain jo action v ly sky kuch na k khud e Us k saath badtameezi sy pesh ayen ya aisa Kuch krein. Sb Equal hain yaha pr na koi Senior na Koi Junior. Apki zuban Apka Zarf dekhati hai. Agr ap Senior smjh kr kisi ko Izzat dety ho ya Junior smjh kr izzat dety ho to agli dafa apko bhi utni e Izzat dy ga. Izzqt deny sy koi chota bara ni ho jata. Han Female members ki Respect ko preferences hain but yeh ni hai k koi Female member kisi male member sy badtameezi sy baat kry ya kuch v aisa. Yr agr ap Sb apas maj aisa kuch kro gy to yr apka Kya impact pry ga.
Jin sy Agr aisa Kuch howa hai to yr wo yeh sb bhool jayan jo howa. ALLAH sy ajr hasil krny ki niyat sy yaha Hain aur Hmy usi sy Garz hai. Hum sb yaha ek dosry ko defend krny k liye v hain as an Organization.
Yr Bs sb Mil kr kaam kro apas mai ek dosry saath Husan-e-Salook sy pesh ao.
Agr kisi ko meri baat buri lgy to mazrat 
But it's my duty share Issues with you.
Jazak Allah 😇🌹

17/09/2022, 7:19 pm - Waleed 21 O-: Surat No 31 : سورة لقمان - Ayat No 13 

وَ اِذۡ قَالَ لُقۡمٰنُ لِابۡنِہٖ وَ ہُوَ یَعِظُہٗ یٰبُنَیَّ لَا تُشۡرِکۡ بِاللّٰہِ   ؕ ؔاِنَّ الشِّرۡکَ لَظُلۡمٌ  عَظِیۡمٌ ﴿۱۳﴾

اورجب لقمان نے اپنے بیٹے سے کہا اوروہ اُس کونصیحت کررہاتھا،اے میرے چھوٹے بیٹے !اللہ تعالیٰ کے ساتھ کسی کوشریک نہ کرنا، بلاشبہ شرک یقیناًبہت بڑاظلم ہے۔
17/09/2022, 7:19 pm - Waleed 21 O-: Surat No 2 : سورة البقرة - Ayat No 165 

وَ مِنَ النَّاسِ مَنۡ یَّتَّخِذُ مِنۡ دُوۡنِ اللّٰہِ اَنۡدَادًا یُّحِبُّوۡنَہُمۡ کَحُبِّ اللّٰہِ ؕ وَ الَّذِیۡنَ اٰمَنُوۡۤا اَشَدُّ حُبًّا  لِّلّٰہِ ؕوَ لَوۡ  یَرَی الَّذِیۡنَ ظَلَمُوۡۤا اِذۡ یَرَوۡنَ الۡعَذَابَ  ۙ اَنَّ الۡقُوَّۃَ لِلّٰہِ جَمِیۡعًا  ۙ وَّ اَنَّ اللّٰہَ شَدِیۡدُ الۡعَذَابِ ﴿۱۶۵﴾

 بعض لوگ ایسے بھی ہیں جو اللہ کے شریک اوروں کو ٹھہرا کر ان سے ایسی محبت رکھتے ہیں ،  جیسی محبت اللہ سے ہونی چاہیے  اور ایمان والے اللہ کی محبت میں بہت سخت ہوتے ہیں  کاش کہ مشرک لوگ جانتے جب کہ اللہ کے عذاب کو دیکھ کر  ( جان لیں گے )  کہ تمام طاقت اللہ ہی کو ہے اور اللہ تعالیٰ سخت عذاب دینے والا ہے  ( تو ہرگِز شرک نہ کرتے )  ۔
17/09/2022, 7:19 pm - Waleed 21 O-: Surat No 4 : سورة النساء - Ayat No 116 

اِنَّ اللّٰہَ لَا یَغۡفِرُ اَنۡ یُّشۡرَکَ بِہٖ وَ یَغۡفِرُ مَا دُوۡنَ ذٰلِکَ لِمَنۡ یَّشَآءُ ؕ وَ مَنۡ یُّشۡرِکۡ بِاللّٰہِ فَقَدۡ  ضَلَّ  ضَلٰلًۢا  بَعِیۡدًا ﴿۱۱۶﴾

 اسے اللہ تعالٰی قطعًا نہ بخشے گا کہ اس کے ساتھ شریک مقرر کیا جائے  ،  ہاں شرک کے علاوہ گناہ جس کے چاہے معاف فرما دیتا ہے اور اللہ کے ساتھ شریک کرنے والا بہت دور کی گمراہی میں جا پڑا ۔
17/09/2022, 7:19 pm - Waleed 21 O-: Surat No 52 : سورة الطور - Ayat No 43 

اَمۡ  لَہُمۡ  اِلٰہٌ  غَیۡرُ  اللّٰہِ ؕ سُبۡحٰنَ اللّٰہِ عَمَّا یُشۡرِکُوۡنَ ﴿۴۳﴾

 کیا اللہ کے سوا  ان کا کوئی معبود ہے؟  ( ہرگز نہیں )  اللہ تعالٰی ان کے شرک سے پاک ہے ۔
17/09/2022, 7:21 pm - Waleed 21 O-: Surat No 16 : سورة النحل - Ayat No 21 

اَمۡوَاتٌ غَیۡرُ  اَحۡیَآءٍ ۚ وَ مَا یَشۡعُرُوۡنَ ۙ اَیَّانَ  یُبۡعَثُوۡنَ ﴿٪۲۱﴾                 8

17/09/2022, 7:21 pm - Waleed 21 O-: Surat No 35 : سورة فاطر - Ayat No 22 

وَ مَا یَسۡتَوِی  الۡاَحۡیَآءُ  وَ لَا الۡاَمۡوَاتُ ؕ اِنَّ اللّٰہَ  یُسۡمِعُ مَنۡ یَّشَآءُ ۚ وَ مَاۤ  اَنۡتَ بِمُسۡمِعٍ  مَّنۡ فِی الۡقُبُوۡرِ ﴿۲۲﴾

22/09/2022, 10:55 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
22/09/2022, 10:55 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: >>> Blood Donation Awareness Camp | Chemical Engineering Department <<<

"Be the reason for someone's Heartbeat"

Its duty of every citizen to use its all possible resources for the betterment of society. Blood Donation could be one possible and practical deed that could prove no less than a miracle in someone's life. 

*So Community project students from chemical engineering Department in collaboration with BDS UET Lahore, New campus has taken an initiative to raise awareness regarding importance of Blood Donation Among students.*
 
Through this camp you can get to know your Blood groups that could help you to donate blood and collection of department data. 

Venue: Chemical engineering department, UET Lahore new campus.
Date and Day : 27 September, 2022 
Tuesday.

Do visit our camp and play your Role for the betterment of society.

Graphics credits:
Haseeb Saleem

Caption credits:
Haseeba Siddique

24/09/2022, 3:33 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
24/09/2022, 3:33 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: Blood donation Society (BDS) and Uet media Society (UMS) is arranging a blood testing camp in UET New Campus.
Blood is essential to help patients survive surgeries, cancer treatment, chronic illnesses, and traumatic injuries. This lifesaving care starts with one person making a generous donation. The need for blood is constant so please come to us and we will tell you your blood group and about donation capabilities. So in case you, your family or we need blood, donate blood so that because of you lives can be saved. Donating blood just once can help save more than one lives.

26/09/2022, 5:54 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: *BLOOD TESTING STALL TOMORROW.*
Venue: Chemical Department
Timing: 8AM - 4PM
26/09/2022, 5:54 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: >>> Blood Donation Awareness Camp | Chemical Engineering Department <<<

"Be the reason for someone's Heartbeat"

Its duty of every citizen to use its all possible resources for the betterment of society. Blood Donation could be one possible and practical deed that could prove no less than a miracle in someone's life. 

*So Community project students from chemical engineering Department in collaboration with BDS UET Lahore, New campus has taken an initiative to raise awareness regarding importance of Blood Donation Among students.*
 
Through this camp you can get to know your Blood groups that could help you to donate blood and collection of department data. 

Venue: Chemical engineering department, UET Lahore new campus.
Date and Day : 27 September, 2022 
Tuesday.

Do visit our camp and play your Role for the betterment of society.

Graphics credits:
Haseeb Siddiqui

Caption credits:
Haseeba Saleem

*Monthly Report - August '22*
Like, share and comment.
30/09/2022, 9:28 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: //Monthly Report - August '22//

Donating blood is an act of solidarity." 
Giving blood saves lives. The blood you give is a lifeline in an emergency and for people who need long-term treatments. 

We highly appreciate  all the donors for their kindness and for taking the time to make a blood donation. We, Red army, thank you from the bottom of our beating hearts for your selfless gift. It will go a long way as you have given someone a lifeline, just at the right time.
We appreciate dedications and  tremendous efforts of every BDS member who played their role in making this achievement in the past two months.

🩸Caption Credit :
 Bushra Eman 

🩸 Graphics Credit:
Usman Akram

08/10/2022, 7:47 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: 12 Rabi-ul-Awal is the great day of realization for the Muslim Ummah that Hazrat Muhammad (SAW) was sent for their reformations, so they must follow his reforms and teachings. 
The personality of Hazrat Muhammad (SAW) is a role model for all of us. His teachings work as a beacon of light in the darkness, not only for the Muslim community but whole humanity. This source of light and guidance can lead us towards the righteous path, which is the true path of God.
On this special day, the Muslims promise themselves more devotedly to follow the Sunnah of their beloved Prophet (SAW). 
BDS wishes you a very happy Rabi-ul-Awal

*Blood Testing Stall - Electrical Department*
11/10/2022, 7:03 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: <Media omitted>
11/10/2022, 7:03 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: *Blood Testing Stall - Electrical Department*
*Thursday, 13th October*
11/10/2022, 7:03 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: //Blood Testing Stall - Electrical engineering department//

"A few drops of your blood can help a life to bloom"

The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life one day that someone maybe a close relative a friend, a loved one,-or even you. 

A decision to donate your blood can save a life, or even several if your blood is separated into its components – red cells, platelets and plasma – which can be used individually for patients with specific conditions.

Through this camp you can get to know your blood group that could help you to donate blood. One blood donation could save up three lives.

Venu:UET Lahore (New CAMPUS) Electrical engineering department.
Date:13, October,2022
Time duration:10AM-3PM

Do visit our camp and play your role for the betterment of society.

Bushra Nasir

21/10/2022, 5:42 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: //Blood Testing Stall - Mechanical Engineering department//

"A few drops of your blood can help a life to bloom"

The blood you donate gives someone another chance at life one day that someone maybe a close relative a friend, a loved one,-or even you. 

A decision to donate your blood can save a life, or even several if your blood is separated into its components – red cells, platelets and plasma – which can be used individually for patients with specific conditions.

Through this camp you can get to know your blood group that could help you to donate blood. One blood donation could save up three lives.

Venu:UET Lahore (New CAMPUS) Mechanical Engineering department.
Date:13, October,2022
Time duration:10AM-3PM

Do visit our camp and play your role for the betterment of society.

🩸 Caption Credits:
Bushra Nasir

*FLOOD RELIEF CAMPAIGN - DETAILS*
29/10/2022, 8:34 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: <Media omitted>
29/10/2022, 8:34 pm - Fatima Sis BDS: BDS raised around 2,50,000 of funds in two months. The Donors were the University fellows, professors and mostly the Family members and relatives of The Members of BDS. We also raised collection by making charity posters and spreading throughout the social media. We assured our donors that their Donation is given to the deserving by providing them the coverage of the Drive. We are giving you the details of where your generous donations were spent as it's the right of every donor to know.

We are thankful to those who give to the cause, and we hope that we will be able to continue our charitable work and assistance in the future. We appreciate all the support and hope to keep helping others through our charitable efforts.
🩸Caption Credits: Abdullah Nawaz 
🩸Graphic credits: Maha Mumtaz

20/11/2022, 5:37 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: "The gift of blood is a gift to someone's life" 
As you All know another month had past 
On behalf of the entire team of Blood donation society(BDS), I would like to express our sincere admiration for yours outstanding efforts in the society. We appreciate everything that you have done over the past several years since you have joined us. The endless hours you have spent working for camps , and the professionalism you have shown has motivated the entire BDS team immensely.

As you all know that our purpose is to make BDS a renown society across Pakistan and to help as many people as we can in their worst time and become the cause of smile for some one.
We pride ourselves on your hard work and dedication to making every critical project a great success. As always, we are counting on you to go the extra mile.

Thank you once again for all your contributions and donations.

❤Caption credits: 
Aneeza Naz \ @aneezatoor

16/12/2022, 12:24 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: <Media omitted>
16/12/2022, 12:24 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: وہ ظلم نہیں بھولے 
شہادت نہیں بھولے
 معصوم فرشتوں کی عبادت نہیں بھولے 
 بارود کے شعلے، وہ تڑپے ہوئے بچے
 ہم لوگ ابھی تک وہ قیامت نہیں بھولے 

16 دسمبر ، پشاور کا یہ دن ، پاکستان کی تاریخ کے "سیاہ دن" کے نام سے یاد کیا جاتا ہے ۔ اس دردناک یاد کو بھلایا نہیں جا سکتا کہ آج کے دن بے شمار ماؤں کی گود اجڑی تھی۔ بے گناہ معصوم پھولوں کے قتل عام پر ہر آنکھ اشک بار تھی۔ درندہ صفت دہشتگردوں نے قوم کے عزائم کو پامال کرنے کی ناکام کوشش کی۔ 

آج کے دن ہم سلام پیش کرتے ہیں ان ماؤں کو کہ جنہوں نے محب وطن جانوں کو جنم دیا ۔ 
سلام پیش کرتے ہیں ان سب اساتذہ کرام کو کہ جنہوں نے اپنی جانوں کی پرواہ کیے بغیر ان بچوں کو بچانے کی بھرپور کوشش کی۔
 اور سلام پیش کرتے ہیں ان معصوم بچوں کو جنہوں نے علم کی راہ میں جام شہادت نوش کیا۔

Alliance creates Self-awareness, Speeds things up & Boosts morale. A strong team can take any crazy vision and turn it into reality. It is the beauty of collaboration with which two societies can grow better & achieve more.
That’s why Blood Donor Society of UET New Campus pridefully proclaiming its alliance with BDS UET Main Campus. We are hopeful that this alliance will prove fruitful for both societies by working towards the ambition of blood donation.

اے قائد اعظم تیرا احسان ہے احسان 
Quaid Day, observed annually on 25th December, is one of the nation’s most beloved public holidays with every Pakistani coming together to mark the birthday of their country’s founding father. Every Pakistani’s heart beats with a sentiment of utmost love and honor for Muhammad Ali Jinnah_In spite of all the obstacles and challenges Jinnah managed to create a separate nation-state for the Indian Muslims known as Pakistan. 
_On Quaid-e-Azam Day we vow to protect Pakistan from all kinds of evils. _Quaid-e-Azam Muhammad Ali Jinnah taught us to see a dream and protect it through hard work, sacrifice and dedication. _The nation known as Pakistan came into existence only due to the foresight and determination of Muhammad Ali Jinnah.

27/01/2023, 4:57 pm - Muzzamil Khan Cs 20: Are you ready for an adventure of a lifetime? Join us on February 3rd for our one-day BDS tour to the majestic Mushkpuri Top.
BDS UET KSK is proud to announce the awe-inspiring views of the mountain range and the serene surroundings. Take a hike to the summit and capture the panoramic views of the valley below. Take a deep breath and soak in the fresh mountain air and enjoy the tranquility that this place has to offer.

Mushkpuri Top is not just a destination, it's an experience. From the lush green forests to the snow-capped peaks, this tour promises to be an unforgettable journey. It's an opportunity for you to disconnect from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and reconnect with nature.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to explore one of the most beautiful places in Pakistan. Book your spot now and get ready to embark on an adventure you'll never forget!
Activities Included:
Mountain Hiking
Photography/videography
Breakfast & Dinner
Road Trip

Mushkpuri Top is not just a destination, it's an experience. From the lush green forests to the snow-capped peaks, this tour promises to be an unforgettable journey. It's an opportunity for you to disconnect from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and reconnect with nature.

Interviews are a hard task students have to face. TEDx New Campus is going to organize a seminar "How to ace an Interview" to help the students to tackle this real life problem and broaden their thinking. Sir Habib-ul-Rehman from Basic Sciences department will be the guest speaker providing best tips and tricks to the students. 
Team TEDx eagerly invite all the students to join us on 15th February, 2023 at Seminar Hall of Mechanical Engineering department from 11AM-1PM.
Mark your presence and learn the basic skills to enhace your qualities.

07/03/2023, 8:55 pm - +92 334 8041060: مانگ لو مانگ لو چشم تر مانگ لو !، درد دل اور حسن نظر مانگ لو

، کملی والے ﷺ کی نگری میں گھر مانگ لو،  مانگنے کا مزہ آج کی رات ہے
On this night of Shab-E-Barat, remember mistakes are forgiven, only if you get the courage to admit them.
It is Shab-e-Barat when the life and death and fortune for the coming year are decided for every man and woman. So, the people offer special prayers in this night to seek forgiveness from Allah Almighty
Allah calls:"Is there anyone who is asking for forgiveness so that I can forgive  them,who is in distress that I may relieve his distress.Is there anyone who need (rizq) food that I may give it to him".

حضرت ابوسعید خدری ؓ سے روایت ہے کہ رسول اللہ ﷺ نے رمضان کے پہلے عشرے میں اعتکاف کیا ، پھر آپ نے درمیانے عشرے میں ایک چھوٹے سے خیمے میں اعتکاف کیا ، پھر آپ نے اپنا سر باہر نکال کر فرمایا :’’ میں نے پہلا عشرہ اعتکاف کیا ، میں اس رات کو تلاش کرنا چاہتا تھا ، پھر میں نے درمیانے عشرے کا اعتکاف کیا ، پھر میرے پاس فرشتہ آیا تو مجھے کہا گیا کہ وہ آخری عشرے میں ہے ، جو شخص میرے ساتھ اعتکاف کرنا چاہے تو وہ آخری عشرہ اعتکاف کرے ، مجھے یہ رات دکھائی گئی تھی ، پھر مجھے بھلا دی گئی ، میں نے اس کی صبح خود کو کیچڑ میں سجدہ کرتے ہوئے دیکھا ہے ، اسے آخری عشرے میں تلاش کرو اور اسے ہر طاق رات میں تلاش کرو ۔‘‘ راوی بیان کرتے ہیں ، اس رات بارش ہوئی ، مسجد کی چھت شاخوں سے بنی ہوئی تھی وہ ٹپکنے لگی ، میری آنکھوں نے رسول اللہ ﷺ کو دیکھا کہ آپ کی پیشانی پر کیچڑ کا نشان تھا اور یہ اکیسویں کی رات (یعنی اکیسویں تاریخ) تھی ۔ متفق علیہ ۔
 معنی کے لحاظ سے بخاری ، مسلم ، اس پر متفق اور «((فقیل لی انھا فی العشر الا واخر))» تک مسلم کے الفاظ ہیں ، جب کہ باقی صحیح بخاری کے الفاظ ہیں ۔


Mishkat ul Masabih#2086

27/06/2023, 9:07 pm - Abdul Subhan Bhai Cs 19: Assalamu Alykum everyone! 

*Congratulations* to new hierarchy for the year 2023-2024✨. Good luck for your upcoming year. You guys will lead this family to greater heights Insha'Allah.♥️
It was an incredible experience with you, and the time flew by! The time I spent in this society  is unreal, met soo many beautiful and hardworking people along the line who shared the same goal as us all i.e. to help others in need let it be financially or by donating blood ❤️  All those events, all those little meetings we had !seeing all of you grow up to take stand and lead on your own makes me feel at ease and happy. Some advise for you: don't jeopardize your mental health and values for anything or anybody. Iss duniya ke race ke bajae apne pr bhi focus kren and duniya ke baad vital stage pr bhi !
I hope all of you will work hard and take this society to a whole new level. If i ever said/did something to offend someone would like to apologise for it. If anyone need any kind of help i am always one text away. 🤝❤️
I will miss you all. This family will always stay close to my heart.
*Farewell  BDS❤️.*
*Signing off,*
*Abdul Subhan*
